text: Back to Bataan is a 1945 American World War II war drama movie directed by Edward Dmytryk and starring John Wayne, Anthony Quinn, Richard Loo, Lawrence Tierney, Fely Franquelli. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1945 drama movies Category:1945 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in the Philippines Category:Movies directed by Edward Dmytryk
title: Back to Bataan
